text:
Hi all! I'm setting up local development and I forked cms-theme-boilerplate. I saw there are some files that I don't know what they do, like blazar.yaml or cms-deploy.yaml. Can I delete these files? I only need to push my changes on github, then deploy by github workflow.
Thanks!

Hello, I am a new user of the HubSpot CLI and after installation, I used my first _*hs fetch '<patch>'*_ to repatriate remote files to a local directory.
After searching the HubSpot document, however, I cannot change the location of my local directory.
How to do ?
What is the syntax please ?

I found this
<https://developers.HubSpot.fr/docs/cms/developer-reference/local-development-cli#r-cup-rer-les-fichiers>
but i can't adapt to my environment

CLI throwing upload errors when using `glyphs` in richtext fieldâ€™s `enabled_features`. <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/module-theme-fields/rich-text-editor#groups-of-controls|Glyphs are valid in docs>
Context: this is not an email module
